All Classes

Class Description
AboutController
The window displaying information about the program
DataHolder
Singleton class for managing collectors and data Needed for communication between windows
Epic
This class manages games from the Epic Games store
Game
Object representing a game and it's associated information
GameCollector
An abstract class that implements the basic functions that all platforms will have.
GameScanController
Window that scans the computer and displays the number of games found
GOG
Platform class for GOG
GUILauncher  
InputOutput
A utility class containing functions for reading and writing data.
KeyInputController
Controller for the key input prompt
Main
Main method for redirecting to the GUI Launcher This is a workaround for a known bug with javafx and java's class handling
MainViewController
Controller for the main window
NewGameController
Controller for the Add new game window
Origin
Platform class for Origin
Other
Platform class for manually added games
PlatformName
The list of platforms that is used throughout the program.
Steam
Platform class for Steam
SteamAPIGame
This class handles the storage and processing of the information from the returned API JSON.
Uplay
Platform class for Uplay
